commitResults.messageTitle: Implemented initial skeletal version of Duke
Add ability to echo user input
Add ability to store user input and display back to user
Add ability to mark and unmark tasks
Tweak to comply with Java coding standards
Split Tasks into Todos, Deadlines and Events
Tweak code to improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody:
The different tasks cause code duplication when adding the tasks to the list
Extracting the print statements to one method reduces redundancy and code duplication

Let's pull up common behaviours to methods so that the methods can be reused across different tasks.

The main method is long and difficult to read.
Due to the many conditionals present to handle different tasks, the code can get quite messy.

Let's extract the statements within the conditional statements into more readable methods.
